title: The Baobab
description: Giant baobab trees have stood guard in Africa for centuries. Also known as "trees of life," baobabs provide food, water, shelter, and more for both people and wildlife. The Baobab provides students with a detailed look at these strange, ancient trees. The book can also be used to teach students how to identify main idea and details and the correct use of coordinate adjectives.
meta: ancient, hollow, shelter, survive, trunks, vitamins
Main Idea and Details : Determine main idea and details
Consonant Blends : Identify initial and final consonant st-blends
Coordinate and Cumulative Adjectives : Recognize and use coordinate adjectives

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
